Package MODEL

Class CommonGoalAbs

java.lang.Object
MODEL.CommonGoalAbs
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CGDecreaseTiles, CGEightTilesSameType, CGFiveTilesDiagonal, CGFiveTilesX, CGFourCorners, CGFourGroupsFourTiles, CGOnColumn, CGOnLines, CGSameTypeSquare, CGSixGroupsTwoTiles
public abstract class CommonGoalAbs extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents a generic common goal card that each player can achieve.
See Also:
